## Basic Usage

Simply pass multiple `<SectionAccordion>` or `<ParagraphAccordion>` components as children to `<AccordionGroup>`.

### A group of SectionAccordions
```jsx
  <AccordionGroup>
    <SectionAccordion title={<Heading size="s">What is a frequently asked question?</Heading>}>
      <Paragraph size='s'>
        Frequently asked questions are lists of questions and corresponding answers intended to answer common queries about a particular subject.
      </Paragraph>
    </SectionAccordion>
    <SectionAccordion title={<Heading size="s">Why do I often find my question missing from the <abbr title="Frequently Asked Questions">FAQ</abbr>?</Heading>}>
      <Paragraph size='s'>
        By their very definition, lists of frequently asked questions strive to include all questions that are frequently asked. If you don’t find your particular question, the most likely reason is that it isn’t frequently asked.
      </Paragraph>
    </SectionAccordion>
    <SectionAccordion defaultOpen title={<Heading size="s">What if I’ve put the question several times to others first?</Heading>}>
      <Paragraph size='s'>
        “Frequently asked” actually means “frequently asked by thousands of users,” not “frequently asked by one user.”
      </Paragraph>
      <Paragraph size='s'>
        For a better answer, you would have to consult an <abbr title="Frequently Asked Questions">FAQ</abbr> about <abbr title="Frequently Asked Questions">FAQ</abbr> about <abbr title="Frequently Asked Questions">FAQ</abbr>. But your time might be better served by simply abandoning your search.
      </Paragraph>
    </SectionAccordion>
  </AccordionGroup>
```

### A group of ParagraphAccordions

```jsx
  <AccordionGroup>
    <ParagraphAccordion leadingText={<Paragraph size="s">
       Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Maecenas dui lacus, porta ut commodo ut, condimentum nec odio. Sed volutpat laoreet erat nec eleifend. Suspendisse iaculis a lacus non viverra. Curabitur sed auctor est, ut faucibus erat.
    </Paragraph>}>
    <Paragraph size="s">
       Class aptent taciti sociosqu ad litora torquent per conubia nostra, per inceptos himenaeos. Sed vestibulum neque magna, ut fringilla ipsum cursus et. Aenean purus lacus,sodales sit amet posuere vehicula, lobortis sed odio. Nam fermentum convallis est.
      </Paragraph>
    </ParagraphAccordion>
    <ParagraphAccordion showTrailingCollapseButton leadingText={<Paragraph size="s">
      Phasellus egestas tellus rutrum tellus pellentesque eu tincidunt tortor aliquam. At elementum eu facilisis sed odio. At elementum eu facilisis sed odio morbi quis. Ligula ullamcorper malesuada proin libero nunc consequat. Sed viverra tellus in hac habitasse platea dictumst vestibulum. Ornare aenean euismod elementum nisi quis eleifend quam. Risus feugiat in ante metus dictum at tempor commodo ullamcorper. Sollicitudin nibh sit amet commodo nulla facilisi. Commodo viverra maecenas accumsan lacus vel.
    </Paragraph>}>
    <Paragraph size="s">
       Class aptent taciti sociosqu ad litora torquent per conubia nostra, per inceptos himenaeos. Sed vestibulum neque magna, ut fringilla ipsum cursus et. Aenean purus lacus,sodales sit amet posuere vehicula, lobortis sed odio. Nam fermentum convallis est.
    </Paragraph>
    <Paragraph size="s">
       Lectus magna fringilla urna porttitor rhoncus dolor purus non. Nunc aliquet bibendum enim facilisis gravida neque. Risus sed vulputate odio ut enim blandit volutpat maecenas volutpat. Nulla porttitor massa id neque. Sed ullamcorper morbi tincidunt ornare massa. Mattis nunc sed blandit libero volutpat sed cras ornare arcu. Elementum pulvinar etiam non quam lacus. Eu augue ut lectus arcu bibendum at.
    </Paragraph>
  </ParagraphAccordion>
  <ParagraphAccordion leadingText={<Paragraph size="s">
       Lectus magna fringilla urna porttitor rhoncus dolor purus non. Nunc aliquet bibendum enim facilisis gravida neque. Risus sed vulputate odio ut enim blandit volutpat maecenas volutpat. Nulla porttitor massa id neque.
    </Paragraph>}>
    <Paragraph size="s">
      Duis ultricies lacus sed turpis tincidunt id aliquet risus feugiat. In cursus turpis massa tincidunt dui ut ornare lectus sit. Fames ac turpis egestas maecenas pharetra convallis posuere morbi. Nibh sit amet commodo nulla facilisi nullam. Faucibus nisl tincidunt eget nullam non. Et tortor consequat id porta nibh venenatis. Aliquam malesuada bibendum arcu vitae elementum curabitur vitae. Purus non enim praesent elementum facilisis. Lacus sed turpis tincidunt id.
    </Paragraph>
    <Paragraph size="s">
      Phasellus egestas tellus rutrum tellus pellentesque eu tincidunt tortor aliquam. At elementum eu facilisis sed odio. At elementum eu facilisis sed odio morbi quis. Ligula ullamcorper malesuada proin libero nunc consequat. Sed viverra tellus in hac habitasse platea dictumst vestibulum. Ornare aenean euismod elementum nisi quis eleifend quam. Risus feugiat in ante metus dictum at tempor commodo ullamcorper. Sollicitudin nibh sit amet commodo nulla facilisi. Commodo viverra maecenas accumsan lacus vel.
    </Paragraph>
  </ParagraphAccordion>
  </AccordionGroup>
  ```
